Sinopse: Competition becomes fierce in the sequel to the hit teen comedy To The Beat as twins Mackie and Mia plus their arch rival and former neighbor Avery, along with all of their friends (and enemies), go back to their performing arts school following spring break. Friendships and feuds continue as sisterhood is tested, rivalries heat up, colorful characters are introduced and new bonds are formed, when Valley Performing Arts students are given the opportunity of a lifetime to audition for an all-expense paid summer scholarship program to the prestigious Triad Conservatory of Fine Arts in New York City.—Production Staff
